name: Tomato Nam Prik
description: Nam prik, the classic Thai dipping sauce, is made more complex and intriguing with the addition of tomatoes. This version of the sauce is perfect alongside a grilled rib-eye.
recipeIngredient: 1 large ripe tomato (about 12 ounces), halved around the equator
1/4 teaspoon (or more) minced hot fresh chile (like Thai or jalapeño)

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the seeds from the tomato. Run the cut side back and forth over a box grater until you’re left holding the core, stem and most of the skin. Repeat with the other half.

Add the remaining ingredients, and stir until the sugar dissolves. Taste, and adjust the seasonings as necessary (add more chile and nam pla or a little salt). Let rest for a few minutes before serving.
